name: @wearenewt/non-fungible-time-subgraph
description: This package contains NFT indexing for the Tokenized Time project

scripts.prepare:mumbai: mustache ./config/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run subgraph:codegen
scripts.prepare:polygon: mustache ./config/polygon.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run subgraph:codegen
scripts.deploy:hosted:mumbai: NETWORK=mumbai env-cmd npm run prepare:mumbai && SLUG=wearenewt/non-fungible-time-mumbai env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted:polygon: NETWORK=polygon env-cmd npm run prepare:polygon && SLUG=wearenewt/non-fungible-time env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
